ygData.subject: Re: ????? & new problem
ygData.msgSnippet: To check what kind of 3d video card you have right click on my computer and go down to properties. Then click on device manager, then double click on display
ygData.messageBody:
To check what kind of 3d video card you have
right click on my computer and go down to properties.
Then click on device manager, then double click on
display adapters it will tell you the video card you
have. I have a Compaq for a old computer and I think
your prob might be your video card. From what I have
seen compaq gives the worst cards with there computers
and you cant upgrade them. Or you can upgrade them
but not alot I still have a new TnT 2 card in the box
that would not go into my compaq. And your computer
can run Ultima Online fine because that game doesnt
require much to play. I used to play UO for a really
short time but never got into it.<br><br>The group
thing is another person asking you to group with them.
To join the group click on main and then push follow
or you can hit disband which will reject the offer
to join the group. Also if you want to start a group
target the person you want in group and push
invite.<br><br>Hope this somewhat helps.<br><br><br>omm
